title: Designing Strategies for Online Class Participation Assessment and Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental online learning platform usage and intermediate-level social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: Quantifying and evaluating engagement in blended real-time/asynchronous digital environments to meet AACSB accreditation standards

learning_goals: Learners can classify and measure online class participation into four categories: cognitive, social, emotional, and behavioral
Learners design an activity plan to achieve engagement time exceeding the Carnegie-unit standard (8,100 minutes)
Learners can analyze instructor-student and student-student interaction patterns and propose improvement plans
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
